data.text: Kuidi ngeyo Yave ndintambika muelꞌama.
Mu ngeyo ndintulanga diana diama, a Nzambi ama.
Kadi mutu wumosi kalendi fua tsoni ko.
Bika wumbonisa zinzila ziaku, a Yave
wundiatisa mu kiedika kiaku ayi wundongi.
A Yave, tebukila kiadi kiaku kingolo moyo
Kadi tebukila moyo masumu mama ma kimuana ;
Yave, widi wumboti ayi wusonga ;
Niandi wudiatisanga batu bakukikululanga mu mambu masonga ;
Zinzila zioso zi Yave zidi zi luzolo ayi zikuikama,
Mu diambu di dizina diaku, a Yave
Buna nani mutu wunkinzikanga Yave ?
Wela viokisa bilumbu biandi mu mamboti ;
Yave weti monikisa mansueki mandi kuidi bobo bakunkinzikanga,
Thalu ama yidi kuidi Yave
Baluka kuidi minu
Ziphasi zi ntimꞌama zilembo buelama ;
Tala ziphasi ziama ayi kiadi kiama
Tala phila bambeni ziama zilembo buelimina
Keba luzingu luama ayi khudi !
Bika fuanana ayi lulama bikheba,
O Nzambi, kula Iseli mu ziphasi ziandi zioso.
